meanings.definition: Not logically or aesthetically ordered; lacking a clear or logical connection.
meanings.sent1: The noncoherent story confused the children.
meanings.sent2: The noncoherent puzzle was impossible to solve.
meanings.sent3: The noncoherent painting looked like a jumbled mess.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as noncoherent as a scattered jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The noncoherent speech left everyone scratching their heads.

meanings.sent2: The noncoherent fabric fell apart after one wash.
meanings.sent3: The noncoherent group of friends always drifted apart.
meanings.sent4: His noncoherent argument lacked a solid foundation.
meanings.sent5: The noncoherent structure collapsed under its own weight.
